review: I don't usually write reviews for stuff I buy. With that said I am pleasantly surprised at how much I am enjoying this device. Once you do the initial setup, all someone must do is be connected to wifi on whatever device they choose. In our home, just about everyone carries around a cell phone with them where ever they are, which makes this even better. For the kids who don't have cell phones, they have the tablet which works equally as well.One area of concern. Chromecast only works on 2.4 GHz WiFi radio. There is an increasing demand for 5 GHz network in today's times simply for the significantly faster speeds it provides under the right conditions. Every wireless device I use in my home is compatible with a GHz network, which in turn makes it my frequency of choice. For anyone that doesn't understand what this means, basically 2.4 GHz is your standard WiFi radio, which just about everything that has ever been WiFi capable is compatible with. Over time with the amount of devices using WiFi, it has caused that particular frequency to become extremely crowded, and every device that uses WiFi is basically fighting each other for those  little invisible air waves. review: This streaming video device is the most affordable of the bunch, and I love how easy it is to set up and work. I watch YouTube and Netflix all the time on my television and the quality is wonderful. If you want Amazon Prime Video, you may want to go with the Amazon Fire Stick, which I hear is probably the best of the bunch. But if you want to watch the basics and don't have a lot of dough to throw away, this player is awesome.
